AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fighters Guild associate
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a low ranking Associate of the Fighters Guild, [PAWN_nameDef] was usually given the least desirable assignments, the ones that paid the least, and the ones that promised no fame. This usually meant clearing out a rat infestation from someones house. Though [PAWN_nameDef] persevered, for eventually [PAWN_pronoun] would receive a promotion.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fighters Guild apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While technically a promotion, [PAWN_nameDef] somehow wound up spending even less time working meaningful jobs as an Apprentice. There was no glory to find, and very little coin to be made. Instead, [PAWN_nameDef] spent most days repairing armour, and sharpening blades.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fighters Guild journeyman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Being a Journeyman, [PAWN_nameDef] was occasionally given some dangerous assignments. Sometimes it would involve clearing poachers out of a kwama egg mine, sometimes dealing with a gang holed up in an ancient tomb, or sometimes [PAWN_nameDef] had to kill a few rats in someones house.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fighters Guild protector
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was ecstatic when they were promoted to Protector. This joy quickly faded when [PAWN_pronoun] found out [PAWN_possessive] first job was to protect some noble, not even a particularly wealthy one at that.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fighters Guild drillmaster
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Having served in the legion, [PAWN_nameDef] knew full what to expect in combat. [PAWN_pronoun] made great use of the knowledge training the recruits of the Fighters Guild. Most would never be promoted past journeyman, but occasionally [PAWN_nameDef] saw something special in one.
